title: PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working
body: Played multiple matches yesterday night, logged off and won't even open the game.

replies.body: A windows update or change in some setting is blocking the patcher from launching, which results in this error.  You'll want to go over the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix things up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
